name: Escape (itch) (edisonliu)
description:
You are a resident of the city of Ottavia. Due to a shortage of resources, most of the villages were taken over by robbers. Your area is no exception, Your mission is to escape and meet the survivors.

Student name : Liu_Zihan

SPACE BAR JUMP

SHIFT  TO SPEED UP
